refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: The core classes (see RFC #2) must not check the values of method parameters. It is up to the classes using the core classes to check this. JavaDoc documentation must however state how to properly use the methods that may throw such RunTimeExceptions.

refsect1.title: Example
refsect1.para: The input parameter number in AtomContainer.getAtomAt(int number) does not check whether the value will throw an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds Exception.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: Most methods apply the rule proposed in this RFC, but not all of them do. Some methods may throw a NoSuchAtom exception when an Atom is asked to be returned and the index does not point to an atom.
